SEARCH
Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.review

Class ReviewService

java.lang.Object
com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.review.ReviewService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IReviewService
@Service public class ReviewService extends Object implements IReviewService
Service for managing reviews. Handles the logic for creating, deleting, and retrieving reviews, as well as calculating average ratings for veterinarians.

  • Method Details

    • saveReview

      @Transactional public Review saveReview(Review review, Long reviewerId, Long veterinarianId)
      Saves a new review for a veterinarian.
      Specified by:
      saveReview in interface IReviewService
      Parameters:
      review - the review to save.
      reviewerId - the ID of the patient submitting the review.
      veterinarianId - the ID of the veterinarian being reviewed.
      Returns:
      the saved review.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the reviewer is the veterinarian.
      AlreadyExistsException - if the patient has already reviewed the veterinarian.
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the veterinarian or patient does not exist.
      IllegalStateException - if the patient has no completed appointments with the veterinarian.

    • deleteReview

      public void deleteReview(Long reviewId)
      Deletes a review by its ID.
      Specified by:
      deleteReview in interface IReviewService
      Parameters:
      reviewId - the ID of the review to delete.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the review does not exist.

    • findAllReviewsByUserId

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Review> findAllReviewsByUserId(Long userId, int page, int size)
      Retrieves a paginated list of reviews for a specific user.
      Specified by:
      findAllReviewsByUserId in interface IReviewService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user.
      page - the page number.
      size - the page size.
      Returns:
      a paginated list of reviews.

    • getAverageRatingForVet

      @Transactional public double getAverageRatingForVet(Long veterinarianId)
      Calculates the average rating for a veterinarian.
      Specified by:
      getAverageRatingForVet in interface IReviewService
      Parameters:
      veterinarianId - the ID of the veterinarian.
      Returns:
      the average rating, or 0 if the veterinarian has no reviews.
